description.raw:
**Linux:**  auto selection of Ubuntu is not working since it lacks [bitbucket-pipelines file](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-launch/pull-requests/7) \(in PR\)

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_launch-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_launch-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_launch-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64))

**Windows:** there is a bug in Windows build of the ign-tools branch:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign_launch-pr-win&build=3)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign\_launch-pr-win/3](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_launch-pr-win/3/))

**Mac:**  [work in progress](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/595) but probably need to wait until the open PRs are merged.

title: Support for ign-launch
